SMS.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a feature on a mobile phone that allows a user to send or receive written messages
SMS.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a system for sending short written messages between mobile phones
SMS.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: a message that is sent using SMS
SMS.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: Bank customers will immediately receive an SMS to verify their transaction.
